1.title: The Launch
1.plot: The sexy reality series returns as Caroline Flack introduces the first contestants.

2.title: Episode #4.2
2.plot: Love Island involves a group of contestants, referred to as Islanders, living in isolation from the outside world in a villa in Mallorca, constantly under video surveillance. To survive in the villa the Islanders must be coupled up with another Islander, whether it be for love, friendship or money, as the overall winning couple receives £50,000. On the first day, the Islanders couple up for the first time based on first impressions, but over the duration of the series they are forced to "re-couple" where they can choose to remain in their current couple or swap and ...

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: Hosted by Caroline Flack from Sant Llorenç des Cardassar, Mallorca, beautiful everyday singles will play the ultimate game of love. After they find their match, they must stay together while surviving temptations as new singles enter the villa. 69 cameras watch the Islanders' every move.

4.title: Episode #4.4
4.plot: Love Island is a British dating reality show. It is a revival of the earlier series of the same name, which aired for two series in 2005 and 2006 on ITV. The series is presented by Caroline Flack, and is narrated by Iain Stirling. 69 cameras watch the Islanders' every move.

58.title: Love Island: The Christmas Reunion
58.plot: Hosted by Caroline Flack from Sant Llorenç des Cardassar, Mallorca, beautiful everyday singles will play the ultimate game of love. After they find their match, they must stay together while surviving temptations as new singles enter the villa. 69 cameras watch the Islanders' every move.

1.title: The Launch
1.plot: We meet 10 new islanders who all have to couple up for the first time. The female islanders are Jessica, Hannah, Lauren, Zoe, and Rachel. The male islanders are Joshua, Jonathan, Luis, Omar, Chris, and Jordan.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: The Italian twins, Tony and John, are new to the villa and have chosen Jess and Danielle as their dates, but what will happen when the ladies have to choose whether they want to spend the night with them or the other half of their couple, Josh and Chris?

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Luis and Omar have to fight the Italian twins, John and Tony, on who can give Rachel and Zoe the best dinner date.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Love Island involves a group of contestants, referred to as Islanders, living in isolation from the outside world in a villa in Mallorca, constantly under video surveillance. To survive in the villa the Islanders must be coupled up with another Islander, whether it be for love, friendship or money, as the overall winning couple receives £50,000. On the first day, the Islanders couple up for the first time based on first impressions, but over the duration of the series they are forced to "re-couple" where they can choose to remain in their current couple or swap and ...

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Lauren must choose who she will pick to stay. Two new girls arrive at the house.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Recap of the first week in the villa.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Daisy and Naomi have to choose the guy that they want to couple up with, after they go on speeddates with 3 different guys of their chosing.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Chris, Luis, Jonathan and Omar have to pick out of 6 girls with who they want to couple up with.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Chris B is new to the villa and he gets first pick out of the girls to couple up with.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Chris and Zoe go on a date, but things don't go very well.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: The public chooses their power-couple, who will then have to send another couple home.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Recap of the second week in the villa.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Beth and Max are new to the villa and Beth already kicks things off by picking a fight with some of the girls.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Jordan wants to get back with Zoe, but Max fancies her as well. Meanwhile, Jonathan and Hannah get into an argument about Naomi flirting with Jonathan.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Zoe finally makes a decision between Max and Jordan. Meanwhile, Luis, Josh and Omar are gossiping about the girls and when it comes out, they try to blame it all on Jess.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: The guys have to dump a girl off the island and the girls have to dump a guy off the island.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: The public have to vote a boy and girl off the island.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Recap of the third week in the villa.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Josh and Jess have a conversation in the kitchen and Josh tells everyone a different story than what actually happened, so they will all get angry with her. Meanwhile, Naomi has been trying to crack on with Luis eventhough she is still with Josh.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Now that Jess and Max have become a bit of a couple, Naomi decides she doesn't want to be with Josh anymore, but might be interested in Max. Jess gets upset because she thinks it might be like the scenario with Josh all over again.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Naomi is playing both Josh and Max.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Naomi has finally made a decision between Josh and Max and chooses Max, but she gets annoyed when she sees that Josh might be moving on from her quicker than she had expected.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: The public get to vote for their favorite islander and the boy and girl with the least votes will have to leave the island.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Recap of the fourth week in the villa.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Luis and Cally host a white party, but things get out of hand when Zoe breaks down about having to face her church and dad after having sex on television.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Josh and Max get to go on a dinner date in the villa with 5 new girls.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Ben and Poppy are new to the villa and try to get it on with Josh and Lauren. Max realises he made a huge mistake to dump Jess for Naomi and really wants to get back together with her. Meanwhile, all the couples have to build their own ship and see which one floats the best.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Max and Jess go on a horse riding date and Max admits he has started to really like Jess. Back in the villa, Poppy and Ben are on their secret mission to get picked bt Josh and Lauren during the recoupling, but things aren't going very smoothly for them.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: The boys have to take a lie detector test.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Recap of the fifth week in the villa.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: All the couples have to do a series of challenges to win a special prize.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Everyone gets a visit from their parents and Max and Josh get grilled by their mum and dad for leaving Jess for Naomi.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Each couple gets a fake baby to look after and the couples who fail to take care of him/her, won't be allowed to join Lauren's birthday party.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: The boys have to write vows for their fake wedding ceremony and Jon wants to ask Hannah to marry her for real. At the end of the show, the winner of Love Island is revealed.

35.title: The Final
35.plot: Love Island involves a group of contestants, referred to as Islanders, living in isolation from the outside world in a villa in Mallorca, constantly under video surveillance. To survive in the villa the Islanders must be coupled up with another Islander, whether it be for love, friendship or money, as the overall winning couple receives £50,000. On the first day, the Islanders couple up for the first time based on first impressions, but over the duration of the series they are forced to "re-couple" where they can choose to remain in their current couple or swap and ...

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Hosted by Caroline Flack from Sant Llorenç des Cardassar, Mallorca, beautiful everyday singles will play the ultimate game of love. After they find their match, they must stay together while surviving temptations as new singles enter the villa. 69 cameras watch the Islanders' every move.

1.title: The Launch
1.plot: The sexy reality series returns as Caroline Flack introduces the first eleven contestants - Jessica, Amber, Sam, Olivia, Marcel, Camilla, Dominic, Chloe, Kem, Montana and Harley.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: Montana and Jessica continue to argue, whilst Kem makes a play for hot headed Amber.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: The girls are treated to two new boys arriving to the villa.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: Three girls chase after Chris, whilst hot headed liar Amber tries to drive a wedge between Kem and Jonny.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: Hot headed Amber throws a hissy fit over a playfull pillow fight with Kem. Camilla and Camilla being to feel the pressure of recoupling.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: Whilst the girls have been sent on a spa day, two new girls clandestinely enter the villa. Hot headed Amber continues to bust Kem's balls.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot: Olivia wants to pie Sam as she just isn't attracted to him. Posh girl Camilla really lets loose at today's kissing challenge.

8.title: Episode #3.8
8.plot: It's Jessica's birthday but not everyone is having a good time. Chris pies Chloe and can finally get grafting on Olivia. Little Sam foolishly tries to threaten Chris. Dom and Jessica escape to the hideaway for some intimate time.

9.title: Episode #3.9
9.plot: Jonny's modern views annoys old school Camilla. Marcel and Gabby enjoy their first kiss.

10.title: Episode #3.10
10.plot: Gabby teaches the girls to twerk into today's 'bootylicious' challenge. New boy Muggy Mike annoys everyone with his manipulative ways.

11.title: Episode #3.11
11.plot: New boy Muggy Mike gets on the other guys nerves with his rude behaviour. Sam puts it on Montana but she's not as keen as he is..

12.title: Episode #3.12
12.plot: A recoupling is announce and everyone is concerned about what Muggy Mike will do. A game of truth or dare bonds the other islanders together. Chloe doesn't have time for Muggy Mike.

13.title: Episode #3.13
13.plot: Muggy Mike's decision to couple with Olivia frustrates Olivia and Chris. Chris calls out Muggy Mike on his slimy, backstabbing behaviour.

14.title: Episode #3.14
14.plot: Muggy Mike still tries it on with Olivia, despite her clearly having feelings for Chris. Sexpert Camilla shows the other islanders the sex positions that they don't know. Montana tells Sam to slow down but it falls on deaf ears.

15.title: Episode #3.15
15.plot: Muggy Mike tries it on with both Chloe and Amber and drastically fails.

16.title: Episode #3.16
16.plot: Jessica's departure leaves the islanders, especially Dom, in shock; whereas Muggy Mike's departure leaves everyone elated.

17.title: Episode #3.17
17.plot: New arrivals Tyla and Simon settle in to the villa, whilst hot-headed amber depresses Kem, again.

18.title: Episode #3.18
18.plot: Dom finds out that Jessica has slept with Muggy Mike. Whilst Kem wants to break up with hot-headed and controlling Amber.

19.title: Episode #3.19
19.plot: Hot-headed Amber grows jealous over Kem simply talking to Tyla. Caroline announcing a shock double dumping leaves everyone shaken.

20.title: Episode #3.20
20.plot: The guys move on from Sam and Chloe's. A surprise re-coupling leads to a few of the guys wondering whether they should choose a new girl.

21.title: Episode #3.21
21.plot: Slimey Jonny is put in his place by Dom. Caroline announces another shock dumping.

22.title: Episode #3.22
22.plot: The boys get a break from the girls at casa amor.

23.title: Episode #3.23
23.plot: Craig is desperate to seduce Camilla so that he can stay in the villa, whilst Montana throws herself at new boy Alex.

24.title: Episode #3.24
24.plot: The boys are loving life in Casa Amor. Caroline announce a special re-coupling, with the risk of everyone being evicted.

25.title: Episode #3.25
25.plot: Five new couples are created after the latest re-coupling. Camilla tries to finally move on from Slimey Jonny.

26.title: Episode #3.26
26.plot: A shock dumping will leave four islanders evicted. Gabby gets controlling over Marcel.

27.title: Episode #3.27
27.plot: Theo and Jamie take 3 girls each on blind dates, leaving Kem slightly jealous.

28.title: Episode #3.28
28.plot: Olivia continues to berate Chris on minor issues. Theo annoys the islanders. Kem has a question for hot-headed Amber.

29.title: Episode #3.29
29.plot: Jamie and Camilla begin to get close A new girl joins the villa and a shock re-coupling turns heads.

30.title: Episode #3.30
30.plot: Slimey Jonny and Theo temporarily calm down. Olivia continues to argue at Chris. Jamie makes his move on eager Camilla.

31.title: Episode #3.31
31.plot: The islanders celebrate Camilla's birthday, with Jamie planning a romantic day. Slimey Jonny and Theo the Melt continue to argue over Tyla.

32.title: Episode #3.32
32.plot: Kem, Chris and Marcel start a legendary rap trio. Slimey Jonny pushes Tyla away with his sulking.

33.title: Episode #3.33
33.plot: Theo the Melt is in hiding after his comments after Jonny's departure left the islanders offended. Impetuous Olivia shouts at Chris again.

34.title: Episode #3.34
34.plot: Muggy Mike and slippery Sam return to the villa, leaving Georgia and Tyla to decide who they want. Kem bosses it at the striptease challenge, much to the chagrin of Marcel.

35.title: Episode #3.35
35.plot: Muggy Mike makes his move on both Tyla and Georgia, whilst slippery Sam picks up the scraps. One guy will be dumped in tonight's recoupling.

36.title: Episode #3.36
36.plot: Slippery Sam tries it on Georgia, whilst the rest of the island sees straight through muggy Mike's and Tyla's faux relationship. Camilla sleeps with Jamie.

37.title: Episode #3.37
37.plot: Impetous Olivia throws a strop after a twitter challenge reveals home truths. The public vote results are announced.

38.title: Episode #3.38
38.plot: Gabby's fake feelings for Marcel are finally revealed in a lie detector test.

39.title: Episode #3.39
39.plot: Every couple is given a baby to look after today with Chris becoming attached to baby Cash Hughes, whilst slippery Sam is the worst father the show has ever had. One couple is dumped from the island.

40.title: Episode #3.40
40.plot: Three couples go on amazing final dates. Montant tells Alex to stop pushing the relationship soo much. The islanders take part in a talent show, with Camilla and Alex struggling to come up with a talent.

41.title: Episode #3.41
41.plot: Despite being already caught out lying, Gabby still strings Marcel along. The final two islanders go on amazing dates. The islanders have a secret ballot to decide who will leave the island next.

42.title: Episode #3.42
42.plot: As is tradition, the islanders parents come to visit them. One couple is dumped from the island at the end of the day.

43.title: Episode #3.43
43.plot: The live final is here but who will the public choose to win the £50,000 cash prize; the nation's sweetheart Camilla or the series favourite, Kem.

44.title: The Reunion
44.plot: Everyone is reunited to discuss life in the love island villa and for the Muggy awards.

imdb.title: Love Island
plot: Single hopefuls looking for love complete tasks, couple off and get voted out week by week. Packed full of drama.
